title: What do you call a toxic Talon main?

replies.body:
what do you call a toxic riven main? 



a riven main
{{champion:92}} WE'RE NOT ALL TOXIC YOU LOSER 1V1 ME IRL I HAVE MASTERY LEVEL 7

If he tried to 1v5, would that make him a... Brave Bird?

If he starts BM-ing on the way, it would be a Flame Charge.

If he managed the penta, he'd have a real Natural Gift.

It would take a lot of Agility, and he might have to perform some Acrobatics.

It could be a real Quick Attack. He'd be so fast that his blades would be like a Razor Wind. 

If he gets Tackled by Malphite he might Growl and Flail about.
http://i.imgur.com/0mKXcg1.gif?noredirect
My feeling.  EXACTLY.
